name: NPR
0:
”Alexa, play NPR”
”Alexa, play the news from NPR”
”Alexa, play NPR One”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. p. r.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to live radio, news and your favorite shows and podcasts from the nationwide network of NPR Member stations.

Here are a few things you can say:

“Alexa, play NPR”
Stream your local public radio station – live.

“Alexa, play the news from NPR” / “Alexa, play NPR One”
Hear a mix of local and national news from your Member station. You can skip stories, rewind and more, and you'll never hear the same story twice.
(Tap the “Link Account” button above to sync your personalized mix of stories with your NPR One mobile app.)

“Alexa, ask NPR to change my station”
Change your station for your live stream and news.

“Alexa, turn on NPR notifications” / “Alexa, turn off NPR notifications”
Get alerts on top stories and breaking news on your Alexa device. Just say, “Alexa, what’s my notification” to hear the alert.

If you have trouble using this skill, please let us know at npr.org/contact or @nprhelp on Twitter.

For everything you can do with NPR on Alexa, visit:
npr.org/alexa
